name: twod_representative
description: Twod (2D) Representative mobile application using Flutter.

scripts.format: dart format lib . && dart run import_sorter:main
scripts.gen:locale: dart run easy_localization:generate -S assets/translations -O lib/src/l10n -o locale_keys.g.dart -f keys
scripts.gen:once: npm run gen && npm run gen:locale
scripts.fac: npm run format && git add . && cz-customizable
